item.title: ¿Qué es el Protocolo escritorio remoto RCP?
item.description: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=NOytvWA0ZQw https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=DXUTEKsroSo https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=RHGYx921Q9I https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=Kr8jz5wDob8 AWS Ubuntu Install with RDP access I need help creating an instance (Ubuntu) then setting up XRDP so I can access the GUI from my macbook via rdp. Then, I need to install https://www.sans.org/tools/sift-workstation/
